name: Merge Duck 2: Idle RPG
description:
Collect an adorable army of mighty ducks! Choose the best strategy to create a unique super duck team!

• Super Simple Fun!
Collect glorious treasures while you take over the world!
Recruit dozens of rare and exotic Ducks(?) and create the ultimate duck army!!
Hundreds of levels across the Adventures and the Legend challenges.
Perfect for Casual Play! Fun for all ages, anyone (and their duck too!) can enjoy "Merge Duck 2"!

• Idle Gameplay
Your duck warriors can fight automatically. You can collect profits even while you are offline.
Put down your phone and get a cup of coffee, all while your ducks collect the spoils of war for you.

• Strategize
Increase your production and battle abilities. There are many different upgrades to choose from.
Select the best path to evolve your duck warriors.
Training camp can enhance the abilities of heroes.

• Collect and Raise Ducks
There are 80 ducks with their own unique abilities waiting for you to collect them.
Raise your ducks and use them to fight. Some are skilled in attack, while others will aid you in defense.
Merge all kinds of incredible super heroes.

• Different Ducklings
There are different superhero ducks in the game.
For example, Dragon Duck, Ninja Duck, Stickman Duck, Mage Duck, Warrior Duck, Super Power Duck.
Form these super ducks into a powerful force that fights, grows, and gains treasure and magic.

• Lord island
Random dungeons await you to explore.
Experience the joy of exploration and the thrill of adventure.
Immerse yourself in turn-based combat and RPG growth fun.
Weapons found in the dungeon will make your hero stronger.
Defeat the black dragon, harvest endless treasures.


Will your ducks rule the world?
The Time is NOW! Lead your Ducks to GLORY!
